h1_title: The Four Heavenly Kings and Erlang Shen
h2_title: How to Find The Four Heavenly Kings and Erlang Shen
content: After crash landing back on Mount Mei, two giants will emerge. This is the Destined One's Stone Monkey form and Erlang Shen. When Erlang is thrown off into the distance, you'll be thrown into a fight against the Four Heavenly Kings.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'The_Four_Heavenly_Kings_and_Erlang_Shen.md', within the main section titled 'The Four Heavenly Kings and Erlang Shen', specifically from the subsection 'How to Find The Four Heavenly Kings and Erlang Shen'.
The content is as follows:
After crash landing back on Mount Mei, two giants will emerge. This is the Destined One's Stone Monkey form and Erlang Shen. When Erlang is thrown off into the distance, you'll be thrown into a fight against the Four Heavenly Kings.
